mapper.update: update tbl_dictionary set item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_level = #{categoryLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_had_child = #{isHadChild,jdbcType=BIT}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=BIT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select item_id, item_name, parent_id, category_level, order_number, is_had_child, is_valid, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, comment from tbl_dictionary where item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select item_id, item_name, parent_id, category_level, order_number, is_had_child, is_valid, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, comment from tbl_dictionary where 1=1 and parent_id = #{parentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
